articles.title: National Memorial Service Held
articles.content:
National Memorial Service Held

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A solemn national memorial service for Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was held in Pyongyang Thursday.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Square was wrapped in a solemn atmosphere.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and supreme leader of the WPK, state and army, appeared on the tribune of honor.
					
					 Present there were members of the National Funeral Committee, Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, officials of the party, state, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture, arts, public health and media, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, mourners delegations from all provinces, people of all social standings, a mourners delegation of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters in China, those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, families of Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and their parties, mourners groups of overseas Koreans and other overseas Koreans, the chief of the Py ongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of foreign countries, members of the military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 All the participants in the memorial service observed a moment's silence in humblest reverence in memory of Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul to accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a memorial address.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who devoted energies and tireless efforts to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche, national reunification and global independence, passed away so suddenly and so early to our regret. This is the greatest loss to the WPK and the revolution and the biggest loss to the nation which no one could have ever imagined.
					
					 All the people, men and women of all ages, who suffered the greatest loss of the nation, unbelievable, visited the bier of Kim Jong Il and the mourning stations in the whole mourning period to mourn his demise in humblest reverence.
					
					 Born as the son of guerrillas in Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution, Kim Jong Il led the revolution and construction to victory with his brilliant wisdom, outstanding ideas and theories, extraordinary leadership ability and noble virtues for a long period, performing the undying revolutionary feats for the country, the nation, the times and history.
					
					 He made a new history of accomplishing the cause of perpetuating the memory of President Kim Il Sung with his noblest revolutionary moral obligation, making sure that the lofty revolutionary life and feats of the President were enshrined in the hearts of the Korean people and mankind to shed rays forever.
					
					 The revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il was a history of a heroic epic of the Songun brilliant commander born of Heaven and peerlessly great man who defended the sovereignty of the DPRK and put the dignity of the country on the highest level while resolutely shattering the moves of the imperialist allied forces for sanctions, pressure and moves for a war with arms.
					
					 Not putting off a jumper all his life, he made forced marches with his indefatigable efforts for field guidance to bring a happy life to the Korean people, considering a day as ten, nay a hundred days. We can never forget this dedication and efforts made by him.
					
					 He was, indeed, an outstanding statesman, peerlessly great man and a great sage of the revolution who steadily advanced the Korean revolution along the road of victory.
					
					 Prompted by his noble mission to carve out the destiny of the country and the nation and the future of the revolution, he gave a steady continuity to the tradition of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the Songun revolutionary cause which started on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He perfectly solved the issue of the succession to the leadership, the hardcore in succeeding to the revolutionary cause. This was the noblest feat he performed for the destiny of the country and the eternal prosperity of all generations to come.
					
					 Standing at the helm of the Korean revolution is Kim Jong Un, the successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the supreme leader of our party and army and people as he fully personified the ideas and leadership, personality, virtues, grit and courage of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 We will turn sorrow into thousand-fold strength and courage and tide over the present difficulties and more dynamically advance along the road of Songun indicated by Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We, who made a pledge in bitter tears before the bier of Kim Jong Il, will accomplish the cause of the Songun revolutionary cause, the cause of building a thriving socialist nation, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as another General and supreme leader.
					
					 The noble and august name of Kim Jong Il and his image with a broad smile on his face will shine for all ages and he will always live in the hearts of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, spoke at the memorial service on behalf of the WPK, Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, on behalf of the KPA and Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, on behalf of the youth and students.
					
					 While recollecting with deep emotion the immortal revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and his revolutionary feats, dedication and efforts for the country and people, the servicepersons and people of the DPRK are keenly feeling once again under what great leader we have lived and struggled, the speakers said.
					
					 They made firm pledges to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, the lifelong desire of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, without fail and carry to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche which started on Mt. Paektu generation after generation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Similar memorial services took place in all provinces, cities and counties tat day.

articles.title: National Memorial Service Starts
articles.content:
National Memorial Service Starts

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- National memorial service for Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, began in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and supreme leader of the party, state and army of the DPRK, took the platform.

articles.title: All People Observe Three Minutes' Silence for Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
All People Observe Three Minutes' Silence for Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Volleys were fired and all the servicepersons and people observed a three minutes' silence in memory of leader Kim Jong Il in Pyongyang and provincial seats at noon sharp Thursday when the national memorial service was under way in the DPRK.
					
					 Locomotives and ships (those on voyage included) blew whistles and those units with sirens sounded them all at once.

articles.title: Condolatory Message from Kyrgyz President
articles.content:
Condolatory Message from Kyrgyz President

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of condolences from Kyrgyz President Almazbek Atambaev on Dec. 22.
					
					 In the message the Kyrgyz president said that he received with sadness the news that Kim Jong Il, leader of the DPRK, chairman of the National Defence Commission and general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, passed away all of a sudden.
					
					 The president expressed sincerest condolences to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Condolatory Message from Colombian Party Leader
articles.content:
Condolatory Message from Colombian Party Leader

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Dec. 22 received a message of condolences from Jaime Caicedo, general secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Colombia.
					
					 The message said that the CPC expressed profound condolences over the demise of Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It noted that at this time of sorrow the CPC extended solidarity to the heroic Korean people and the WPK in their struggle to protect the sovereignty from the imperialists' aggression and achieve regional and world peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Condolatory Message from Egyptian Party Leader
articles.content:
Condolatory Message from Egyptian Party Leader

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a condolatory message from Ahmad Hassan, general secretary of the Nasser Arab Democratic Party of Egypt, on Dec. 25.
					
					 Noting that he learnt the unexpected news that leader Kim Jong Il passed away, the message said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il, upholding the banner of independence and socialism, struggled for independence of the DPRK and supported the world people standing against the moves of the U.S.-led imperialists and racists.
					
					 He strived for prosperity of the DPRK and the welfare of the Korean people under the situation in which the world people's struggle for independent and dignified life was going through turns and twists.
					
					 When some countries were following the U.S. and the imperialist policy, he fought for peace and people's independence, adhering to the principle and pushed ahead with socialist construction despite the waves of adversity.

articles.title: Condolatory Message from Nepali Political Personage
articles.content:
Condolatory Message from Nepali Political Personage

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of condolences from Narayan Man Bijukchhe, chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party, on December 19.
					
					 The chairman in the message noted he was deeply saddened to hear the news that Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, suddenly passed away.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung against colonialism and imperialism and the party guiding Korean-style socialism with Songun politics, it noted, adding:
					
					 Although he passed away, the feats performed by him will always remain in our hearts.
					
					 It expressed conviction that Kim Jong Un would lead the Korean people to victory in their efforts to realize national reunification, advance Korean-style socialism and achieve independence.

articles.title: Condolatory Messages from Koreans in China
articles.content:
Condolatory Messages from Koreans in China

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Koreans organizations and compatriots in China sent messages of condolences on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They came from the General Association of Koreans in China and its affiliated regional associations in Zhongnan, Yanbian, Jilin, Harbin, Mudanjiang and Jiamusi, city branches in Beijing, Jixi, Ningan, Hailin, Jiamusi, Panjin, Hegang, Qitaihe, Tieli, Harbin and Dandong, the Youth Federation of Koreans in China, the Federation of Korean Businessmen in China and the Yanbian Regional Youth Committee.

articles.title: Wreath from Mongolian People's Party
articles.content:
Wreath from Mongolian People's Party

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Mongolian People's Party sent a wreath to be placed before the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il on display in the plaza of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium to express deep condolences over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The wreath was placed by Sodovjamts Khurelbaatar, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, on Dec. 29.

articles.title: Foreign Party Leaders Visit DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Foreign Party Leaders Visit DPRK Embassies

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the Council of the Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front who is member of its Executive Committee, paid a condolatory visit to the DPRK embassy in Addis Ababa on December 26 and Evariste Boshab, general secretary of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of Democratic Congo, and his party also paid a condolatory visit to the DPRK embassy in Kinshasa on December 27 on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They laid wreaths before the portraits of Kim Jong Il and paid silent tribute to him.
					
					  The general secretary of the Council of the Ethiopian Democratic Front wrote in the mourners' book that he, on behalf of the leadership and all members of the Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front, expresses the most profound condolences over the demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Evariste Boshab noted in the mourners' book that the demise of Kim Jong Il is a great loss to humankind, reaffirming that his party would always stand by the Korean people and the Workers' Party of Korea in their efforts to boost the friendship and defend justice.
					
					 Meanwhile, personages of political parties and organizations of Pakistan paid condolatory visits to the DPRK embassy in Islamabad on December 20 and 21 over the demise of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They included the general secretary of the Sind Provincial Committee and the secretary of the Information Department of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan People's Party, the general secretary of the Karachi Branch of the Worker-Peasant Party, the deputy secretary general of the Pakistan Trade Union Federation and the secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association.

articles.title: Foreign Political Figures Visit DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Foreign Political Figures Visit DPRK Embassies

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Thai Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra and Bangladeshi Foreign Minister Dipu Moni paid condolatory visits to the DPRK embassies in their countries on Tuesday on demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They placed wreaths before the portrait of Kim Jong Il and paid silent tribute.
					
					 The Cambodian Senate delegation made up of the chairman of the Second Senate Committee, the chairman of the Ninth Senate Committee, the vice-chairman of the Third Committee and senators paid a condolatory visit to the DPRK embassy Monday.
					
					 The delegation laid a wreath before the portrait of Kim Jong Il and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 The chairman of the Second Senate Committee said the Senate and people of Cambodia are hardly repressing bitter grief at the news that His Excellency Kim Jong Il passed away.
					
					 He expressed deep condolences to the bereaved family members and the government and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The leadership and heroism displayed by Marshal Kim Jong Il will be remembered by history and cherished in the hearts of humankind, he stressed.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Visit DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Visit DPRK Embassies

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A mourners group of the Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union of Vietnam, a delegation of the Secretariat of the Great King, a delegation of the Ministry of Culture and Arts of Cambodia and a delegation of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group paid condolatory visits to the DPRK embassies in their countries on December 26 and 27 over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They laid wreaths, bouquets and flowers before the portraits of Kim Jong Il and paid silent tribute to him.
					
					 Samlee Plianbangchang, director of the Regional Office for South-East Asia of the WHO, Tuesday paid a condolatory visit to the DPRK embassy in New Delhi. He laid a flower basket before the portrait of Kim Jong Il and paid silent tribute to him.
					
					 Keith Bennet, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, paid a condolatory visit to the DPRK embassy in London on Dec. 20 and expressed condolences.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il was a legendary brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu and a patriot and internationalist without an equal. He will always live in the hearts of mankind, he added.

articles.title: Austrian Visit DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Austrian Visit DPRK Embassy

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Austrian Federal President Heinz Fischer expressed deep condolences on the passing away of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Upon his authorization, the assistant to the president for external policy paid a condolatory visit to the DPRK embassy in Vienna on December 27 and observed a moment's silence before the portrait of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He made an entry in the condolence book.

articles.title: Koreans in China Visit Mourning Centers
articles.content:
Koreans in China Visit Mourning Centers

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Koreans in China and compatriots visited mourning centers arranged in Yanbian regional association, Hailin City branch, Longjing City branch, Jiamusi City branch and Dandong branch under the General Association of Koreans in China and the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Visitors to the mourning stations included Choe Un Bok, chairperson of the association, and its officials and officials and members of regional associations and branches under the association. Regional associations included those in Zhongnan, Yanbian, Jilin, Harbin, Mudanjiang, Jiamusi and city branches included those in Beijing, Shenyang, Panjin, Anshan, Fushun, Yanji, Longjing, Helong,　 Hunchun, Tumen, Tunhua, Baishan, Jixi, Ningan, Hailin, Jiamusi, Tieli and Changbai County.
					
					 Mourners also included members of the General Association of Korean Youth in China, the Korean Economic Workers in China, the Youth Committee in Yanbian Region, Hwang Yong Du, chairman of the Liaoning regional association of the General Association of Koreans in China, and his family, the association of Korean elderly in China, Shenyang association of old Korean teachers, the Shenyang solidarity council of Koreans, the Liaoning association of Koreans for economic and cultural exchange, Liaoning provincial association of Korean businessmen, the Shenyang city association of Korean businessmen, the Shenyang-Korea Trade Company Ltd., the Shenyang New Century Trade Company, the China International Investment Trade Company, the Liaoning Chemical Industrial Export and Import Company and the National Research Institute of Yanbian University and Koreans in China. 
					
					 The participants placed wreaths in memory of Kim Jong Il and paid silent tribute.

articles.title: Party for Consoling Overseas Compatriots Held
articles.content:
Party for Consoling Overseas Compatriots Held

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A party arranged by the dear respected Kim Jong Un was given at the Mokran House for consoling overseas compatriots on Thursday. 
					
					 Present there were a delegation of mourners of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of its Central Standing Committee, a delegation of mourners of the General Association of Koreans in China led by its Chairperson Choe Un Bok, and other delegations of mourners of Chongryon, visiting groups of overseas Korean mourners and overseas Koreans. 
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yang Gon, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Yang Gon said in his speech that Kim Jong Un showed such deep loving care as arranging a party to console the grief-stricken overseas compatriots. 
					
					 This party is associated with the trust and love of Kim Jong Un wishing them to convert sorrow into thousand-fold strength and courage and invariably keep to the road of patriotism, he noted, and continued: Standing in the van of the Juche revolutionary cause today is Kim Jong Un who is identical to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in ideas, leadership, virtues, personality and traits.
					
					 Our army and people will build a thriving socialist nation of Juche without fail and achieve the cause of national reunification, the desires of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Nam Sung U said in his speech: As I am sitting at the table of the party arranged under the loving care, I feel a lump in my throat at the thought of the kind-hearted General, our father. 
					
					 He stressed Kim Jong Un is the heart of Kim Il Sung's nation, a symbol of dignity and mightiness of Songun Korea and a strong mainstay of independence and justice.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Un is encouraging the homeland and people of Kim Jong Il to rise above bitter sorrow with his intense loyalty, extraordinary leadership art and virtues, he called for developing overseas compatriots' organizations including Chongryon into powerful patriotic organizations which share destiny with the socialist homeland.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Renew Their Will to Remain Loyal to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Renew Their Will to Remain Loyal to Kim Jong Un

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on a visit to the socialist homeland for mourning the demise of leader Kim Jong Il expressed their feelings in bitter grief. 
					
					 Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, said: Is it true Kim Jong Il, our father, passed away? He can't pass away. Generalissimo Kim Il Sung earnestly asked us to take good care of Kim Jong Il. Now how can we ask for atoning for this wrong. We are undutiful.   
					
					 Kwon Kyong Ae, vice-chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, said:
					
					 One can hardly find such great man as General Kim Jong Il anywhere else. We will make the exploits of Kim Jong Il shine forever. 
					
					 We will faithfully uphold the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Pak Jong Sang, permanent advisor to the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, said he has never thought of the homeland without Kim Jong Il. The Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan will always remember his love, he added. 
					
					 Ha Thae Hong, director of the Hagu Bookshop of Chongryon, noted: All of us could lead a dignified life, our chests thrown out even in an alien land thanks to Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Ri Jun Sik, head of the visiting group of students of Joson University of Chongryon, said, when interviewed by KCNA: 
					
					 We have the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, another General. We will steadfastly carry forward the patriotic tradition, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Wrapped in Solemn Atmosphere in Memory of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
DPRK Wrapped in Solemn Atmosphere in Memory of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A solemn atmosphere of memorizing leader Kim Jong Il pervades the DPRK Thursday after Koreans bade last farewell to him Wednesday.
					
					 The Pyongyang citizens thronged to memorial venues along the path Kim Jong Il used to take when he was leaving for the forced march for people's happiness and along the streets where they bade last farewell to him.
					
					 People from all walks of life packed memorial venues associated with the leadership feats of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 The Koreans, recollecting in tears Kim Jong Il's whole life of heroic dedication to the country, the revolution and the people, are keenly realizing what a great man and legendary strong man they had been led by.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, peerlessly illustrious commander of Songun who was possessed on the highest level of the qualifications and personality as a great man, led the revolution and construction along the ever-victorious path with his profound ideologies and theories, outstanding leadership and warm human love.
					
					 Amid strong yearning for Kim Jong Il, the servicepersons and people of the DPRK are hardening the faith that Kim Jong Il will always be with them and the DPRK will prosper forever as long as there is the dear respected Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Disallowing Condolatory Visits to Pyongyang
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Disallowing Condolatory Visits to Pyongyang

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Women's Solidarity of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Wednesday denouncing the authorities for preventing it from making a condolatory visit to Pyongyang to mourn the passing of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The organization said that it is quite just to express sympathy over the passing of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il and make a condolatory visit to the north, but the south Korean authorities disapproved the visit till the moment the funeral started in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Branding it as an act against humanity, the organization continued:
					
					 Had the authorities expressed heartfelt sympathy to the government and compatriots of the north who were overcome with sorrow over the loss of their leader, it would have offered an opportunity for restoring the trust between the south and the north and sent "government" and civilian-level mourners' group to Pyongyang. 
					
					 The authorities, however, missed the good opportunity.
					
					 This proved that no one can expect peace and reunification under the present "government" as it defies the people's demand for getting the danger of a war removed and living on a peaceful land.
					
					 The women's organization declared it would wage more vigorous campaign for judging the "government" which bedeviled the south-north relations and destabilized the people's life while standing against reunification.

articles.title: E European and Central Asian Regional Committee to Memorize Inaugurated
articles.content:
E European and Central Asian Regional Committee to Memorize Inaugurated

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions held an emergency joint meeting on Dec. 25 on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the organization was placed. It decided to inaugurate the East European and Central Asian Regional Committee to Memorize Comrade Kim Jong Il and hold diverse memorial events praising his revolutionary career and exploits.
					
					 Elena Bavichi, chairwoman of Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia, was elected chairwoman of the committee.

articles.title: Joint Committee for Mourning Demise Formed in Russia
articles.content:
Joint Committee for Mourning Demise Formed in Russia

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Three Russian political parties formed a joint committee for mourning the passing away of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They included the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the Communist Workers' Party of Russia-Revolutionary Communist Party and the International Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party".
					
					 Mozgovoi, first secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, was elected chairman of the joint committee.
					
					  The joint committee in its statement on Dec. 26 expressed deep condolences over the demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said that his august name is always associated with all the successes achieved by the Korean people in the glorious course of the struggle to apply the Juche idea, build a thriving socialist nation and create conditions favorable for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 His name is directly connected with the great vitality of the Songun policy which set an example to be followed by all world peace-loving people and countries in the anti-imperialist struggle. It is always linked with the unquenchable torch of socialism for overpowering the imperialists seeking to dominate the world.
					
					 The joint committee expressed conviction that the Korean people would dynamically advance along the road chosen by themselves under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Flags Hoisted at Half-Mast at UN Buildings
articles.content:
Flags Hoisted at Half-Mast at UN Buildings

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A flag was hoisted at half-mast at the UN headquarters on Wednesday morning to the memory of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Flags were hoisted at half-mast at the buildings of the UN Office in Vienna, UNESCO, WHO, WFP and other UN organizations around the world on the same day.

articles.title: Memorial Services Held by Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Memorial Services Held by Koreans in Japan

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Memorial services for leader Kim Jong Il have been held by headquarters and branches of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on his demise.
					
					 They included those in Kanagawa, Chiba, Fukushima, Aomori, Iwate, Aichi, Kyoto, Gifu, Tochigi, Niigata, Nishi Tokyo, Osaka and Fukuoka prefectures. 
					
					 Officials of Chongryon and compatriots placed flowers before the portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il and paid silent tribute to his memory.
					
					 The participants in the memorial services praised Kim Jong Il as peerless patriot and kind-hearted father of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 They vowed to lay a springboard from which to bring about the new golden days of the movement of Koreans in Japan under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Personages of Finland and Ecuador issued statements on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, said in a statement on December 25, said that he expressed deep condolences to the bier of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the great leader who devoted his all to most loyally upholding the revolutionary ideas and cause of President Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, without the slightest deviation, said the statement.
					
					 Standing at the head of the Korean people is the dear respected Kim Jong Un. it noted.
					
					 Trotsky Serano, president of the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador, in a statement on December 23 praised Kim Jong Il as the great sun of the 21st century and a world political elder.
					
					 The undying feats he performed for global independence will always go down in history, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's revolutionary cause is sure to be accomplished under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Miriam Pellegrini Ferri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy and chairperson of the Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty, and Bruno De Vita, president of the Teleambiente TV Consortium, in their television appearances on Dec. 21 praised Kim Jong Il's personality as a great man on his demise.

articles.title: Foreign Media Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Media Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi newspaper Blits posted special write-ups on its Internet homepage between Dec. 22 and 24 on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The homepage said in an article captioned "Leader Kim Jong Il and red flag" said: The bier of HE Kim Jong Il is draped in a red flag, a brilliant symbol of his revolutionary faith and will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					  In an article titled "The Korean children calling father in chocking voices" it noted HE Kim Jong Il, busy as he was with providing the Songun revolutionary leadership, gave everything he could do to the children so that there might not be the slightest shadow on their faces.
					
					 A workers' union in Moscow on Dec. 24 in an article posted on its Internet homepage said that Kim Jong Il gave correct answers to many issues arising in the course of revolutionary struggle and protected the destiny of socialism through his energetic theoretical and practical activities at a time when the world socialist movement was undergoing serious frustration.
					
					 The Ecuadorian paper Tribuna on Dec. 21 noted Kim Jong Il wisely led all the Korean people to uphold the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, as the only guiding idea.
					
					 The Jordanian paper Al Diyar on Dec. 24 said Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to developing the friendly relations with other countries and achieving peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Memorial Events Held Abroad
articles.content:
Memorial Events Held Abroad

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Memorial events were held in different countries from December 23 to 27 on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They included memorial meetings held by the Bangladesh People's League, the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and the International Taekwon-do Federation of Mongolia, memorial events that took place in Kiev and Mariupol Cities, Ukraine and memorial services held in Indonesia, Nepal, Iran and Mongolia.
					
					 The brief biography of revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il was introduced and speeches were made at the memorial meetings.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speakers included Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladeshi People's League, M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, and M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy. They highly praised Kim Jong Il as the leader who made an undying contribution to accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 The general chairperson of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said that the demise of Kim Jong Il is the greatest loss to the Workers' Party, the government and the people of the DPRK, adding that he will live forever in the hearts of the world progressives.
					
					 The chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea who is chairman of the Ukrainian Committee for Mourning Comrade Kim Jong Il noted that thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il the Korean People's Army could powerfully show its might as an invincible army to the world.
					
					 The chairman of the Association for the Study of the Songun Politics in Mariupol City of Ukraine stressed that the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il before the Korean and world revolutions would shine forever.
					
					 The greatest exploit performed by Kim Jong Il is that he fully ensured the succession to the leadership, the vice-chairman of the Association in Mariupol City said.

articles.title: Foreign Media on Love Shown for People during Mourning
articles.content:
Foreign Media on Love Shown for People during Mourning

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries on Dec. 24 and 25 introduced a legend about the loving care shown for people during the mourning for the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Blits posted on its Internet homepage an article illustrated with a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It said: HE Kim Jong Un fully personifies HE Kim Jong Il's love for people.
					
					 He earnestly instructed his officials to provide convenience to the people stricken with bitter grief day and night over the great loss to the nation on a top priority basis under any circumstances.
					
					 He is the tender-hearted father of the Korean people identical to Kim Jong Il and the sun of destiny whom they should follow to the end of the world, the article said, and went on:
					
					 On the evening of Dec. 16 just a day before Kim Jong Il breathed his last, he again took a measure for the supply of fishes, touching the people. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un took a special measure for transportation of fishes, saying Kim Jong Il's loving care for the people should reach them as early as possible though it was a mourning period.
					
					 The Pyongyangites are renewing their firm pledges to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem, saying the history of loving care shown by Kim Jong Il for the people is given a steady continuity and the Korean people are the only people in the world blessed with the illustrious leaders.
					
					 Media of China, Iran, Finland, Britain and the U.S. conveyed the same story.

articles.title: Gift from SG of IIJI
articles.content:
Gift from SG of IIJI

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 The secretary general handed the gift over to an official concerned on Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Remembered
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Remembered

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The 48th issue of the Russian paper Patriot carried an article titled "Song of revolution and love" illustrated with photos of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu on the 94th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Though Kim Jong Suk, an outstanding woman activist of Korea, passed away too early, her life is shining like a star, the paper said.
					
					 Conveying the words of President Kim Il Sung that Kim Jong Suk dedicated all her life to comrades not for her own, the paper introduced in detail that the woman commander of Mt. Paektu fully ensured the safety of Kim Il Sung with her intense loyalty to the leader, high vigilance and bravery. 
					
					 Brief as her life was, her exceptionally brilliant life goes down in history as an excellent song of revolution and love, it noted.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Suk Lauded
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Suk Lauded

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on Dec. 24, the 94th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk took part in the anti-Japanese armed struggle, earning fame as a distinguished woman guerilla commander and a sharp shooter, the statement said.
					
					 Recalling that she safeguarded President Kim Il Sung, the sun of the Korean nation, politically and ideologically and at the risk of her life, the statement referred to the fact that she gave birth to Kim Jong Il and brought him up to be a future illustrious commander of Songun when the bloody battles against the Japanese imperialists were at their height.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk displayed noble devotion and self-sacrificing spirit during the anti-Japanese armed struggle by boundlessly valuing and loving her comrades, it noted, and continued: After Korea's liberation she dedicated herself to the people, leading a simple life.
					
					 Embodying the President's Juche-oriented theory on women's emancipation, she energetically worked to free all the women from imperialist and feudal oppression, it concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Indonesian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Indonesian Paper

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) --The Dec. 21 issue of the Indonesian paper Suara Karya carried an article titled "Kim Jong Un, new leader of the DPRK." 
					
					 The article noted:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un is recognized as the youngest leader not only in the DPRK but in the world.
					
					 He has assisted leader Kim Jong Il in his work since long ago.
					
					 Last year he received a military title of General and assumed the important responsibility as vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He is identical to President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the DPRK.
					
					 He is now leading all state affairs including politics, military affairs and economy.

articles.title: Issue of Succession Finds Successful Solution in DPRK
articles.content:
Issue of Succession Finds Successful Solution in DPRK 

					 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian Internet newspaper on Dec. 25 posted an account of the paper's interview with the Brazilian ambassador to the DPRK on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Upon hearing the sad news of the demise of Kim Jong Il, the Korean people could hardly keep back their sorrow over his demise, the paper said, noting this sadness of the Korean people was sincerest.
					
					 Kim Jong Il enjoyed the highest respect and boundless reverence from the people, it said, adding:
					
					 The issue of succession to leadership was successfully solved in the DPRK. This is clearly proved by the fact that HE Kim Jong Un assumed the heavy responsibility as vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK last year.
					
					 Brazil will maintain friendly relations with the DPRK in all fields and positively support the Korean people in their efforts to achieve national reunification.

articles.title: Tiene lugar en Pyongyang acto central en memoria de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar en Pyongyang acto central en memoria de Kim Jong Il

					Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar solemnemente el dia 29 en esta capital el acto central de condolencias en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Las explanadas frente a la Plaza Kim Il Sung, el Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang y otros lugares de esta capital elegidos como sedes del acto se llenaron de los funcionarios, oficiales y soldados del EPC, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y estudiantes entristecidos por haber perdido al gran hombre de la nacion. 
					
					Salio a la tribuna Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del PTC, el Estado y el ejercito de Corea. 
					
					Entre los participantes se distinguian los miembros de la comision funeraria estatal como Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Yong Chun, Jon Pyong Ho y Kim Kuk Thae, y el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Presidium de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), Nam Sung U, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, el Estado, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, de las entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, los familiares de martires revolucionarios, las delegaciones de las provincias, los trabajadores de distintos estratos, la delegacion de condolencias de la Chongryon, los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses  y los relacionados con la lucha antijaponesa residentes en China, los familiares de los relacionados chinos con la misma lucha y sus comitivas, los grupos de visita de condolencias de los coreanos residentes en ultramar, los compatriotas residentes en ultramar, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los representantes diplomaticos y los miembros del cuerpo de agregados militares de varios paises, los representantes de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					Con el sentimiento de maxima reverencia, todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il quien realizo hasta el ultimo momento de su grandiosa vida incansables esfuerzos espirituales y fisicos por el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion del Estado prospero socialista. 
					
					El discurso funebre estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					El dijo muy afligido que el fallecimiento tan inesperado, tan lamentable y tan temprano del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien realizaba incansables esfuerzos fisicos y mentales por el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la reunificacion de la patria y la verificacion de la causa de la independencia en el mundo entero, es la maxima perdida para el partido y la revolucion y el gran duelo nacional nunca imaginado. 
					
					Durante el periodo de ese duelo increible, los habitantes de todas las edades y generos de todo el pais rindieron los mas sentidos tributos a la memoria del Dirigente ante su feretro y en los lugares habilitados para ese fin, senalo el orador y prosiguio: 
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, nacido como hijo de la guerrilla en el monte Paektu, el sagrado de la revolucion, condujo durante largo tiempo la revolucion y la construccion a la senda de victorias con su genial prevision, destacada ideologia y teoria, extraordinaria capacidad de guia y nobles virtudes y realizo imperecederas hazanas revolucionarias ante la patria, la nacion, la epoca y la historia. 
					
					Creo la nueva historia del cumplimiento de la causa de eternidad del lider con la mas noble moralidad revolucionaria e hizo brillar para siempre en el corazon del pueblo coreano y la humanidad la gran vida y las hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					La vida revolucionaria de Kim Jong Il fue la trayectoria epica del General Insigne del Songun y patriota sin par quien defendio la soberania de la RPDC frustrando rotundamente con el poderio de las fuerzas armadas las sanciones, presiones y maniobras belicistas de la coalicion imperialista y situo en el plano cimero la dignidad del pais.
					
					No podremos olvidar nunca los trabajos abnegados del Dirigente quien para hacer feliz al pueblo, continuo su incansable marcha forzada de direccion en el terreno vestido en su chaqueta de campana durante toda la vida viviendo cada dia haciendolo valer por diez y cien dias.
					
					El Dirigente era destacado politico, gran hombre sin par y gran sabio de la revolucion quien impulso la revolucion coreana a la unica senda de victorias.
					
					Bien consciente de su noble mision de responsabilizarse del destino de la patria y la nacion y del futuro de la revolucion, el dio la garantia de continuacion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada en el monte Paektu.
					
					Su hazana mas valiosa realizada por el destino de la patria y la prosperidad de todas las generaciones venideras es haber solucionado perfectamente el problema de sucesion de guia que resulta el fundamental en la continuacion de la causa revolucionaria.
					
					Hoy dia, al frente de la revolucion coreana esta el camarada Kim Jong Un, sucesor de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Kim Jong Un es el Maximo Dirigente del partido, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea quien heredo integramente la ideologia, el modo de direccion, las personalidades, las virtudes, la audacia y el coraje del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Superaremos las dificultades de hoy convirtiendo la tristeza en las fuerzas y coraje multiplicados bajo la direccion de Kim Jong Un y avanzaremos a pasos mas firmes por el sendero del Songun indicado por el Dirigente.
					
					Enalteceremos al camarada Kim Jong Un como otro General y Maximo Dirigente, como hemos jurado con lagrimas ante el feretro de Kim Jong Il, y cumpliremos hasta el final la causa revolucionaria del Songun y la de construccion del Estado prospero socialista.  
					
					El nombre sagrado y la imagen del Sol del Dirigente Kim Jong Il brillaran para siempre y quedaran eternamente en el corazon del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos.
					
					 Le siguieron en pronunciar discursos Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y Ri Yong Chol, primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista       Kim Il Sung, en representacion del PTC, el EPC y la juventud y el estudiantado por ese orden.
					
					  Los oradores dijeron que vuelven a sentir en lo profundo del corazon que gran lider fue el camarada Kim Jong Il, con que vinieron luchando y viviendo, al recordar con gran emocion su inmortal vida y hazanas revolucionarias y los abnegados e incansables trabajos realizados por el por la patria y el pueblo.
					
					  Tomaron el juramento de cumplir sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria, deseo de toda la vida del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu siguiendo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Este dia, tuvieron lugar solemnemente los actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos.

articles.title: Iniciado en Pyongyang acto central en memoria de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Iniciado en Pyongyang acto central en memoria de Kim Jong Il

					Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciado en esta capital el acto central de condolencias en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					 Salio a la tribuna Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.

articles.title: Guardan 3 minutos de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Guardan 3 minutos de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il

					Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- A las doce en punto del dia 29, cuando se realiza el acto central de condolencias en memoria del Dirigente           Kim Jong Il, se tiraron en la ciudad de Pyongyang y todas las cabeceras provinciales las salvas en honor del fallecido y todos los militares y civiles guardaron 3 minutos de silencio. 
					
					Y tocaron simultaneamente las sirenas todas las unidades capaces de hacerlo como las locomotoras y embarcaciones (incluso los barcos en plena navegacion).

articles.title: Pyongyang envuelta en clima sublime para honrar a Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Pyongyang envuelta en clima sublime para honrar a Kim Jong Il

					Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Este dia, el siguiente de la despedida del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Corea se vio envuelta en el mas sublime clima en memoria de el.
					
					 Los capitalinos de diferentes sectores se dirigieron voluntariamente a los lugares habilitados para la expresion de condolencias por los mismos caminos donde el Dirigente emprendia su intensisima orientacion en el terreno para hacer mas feliz al pueblo y fue despedido ayer por millones de habitantes y militares.
					
					  En esos lugares estan grabadas las huellas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Los reunidos sienten en lo profundo del corazon la grandeza del Dirigente, hombre legendario, recordando su vida de abnegacion heroica por la patria, la revolucion y el pueblo.
					
					  El General Insigne del Songun, que poseia a la perfeccion las personalidades y cualidades de gran hombre, condujo a la senda de victorias la revolucion y la construccion con sus profundos pensamientos y teorias, extraordinaria direccion y calido humanitarismo.
					
					  Todos los militares y civiles coreanos, que le anoran con ansia, redoblan su conviccion de que el camarada Kim Jong Il vive siempre en ellos y Corea prosperara si es guiada por el respetado Dirigente Kim Jong Un, identico a aquel.
